description: Major workflow governance update - intent mapping, no improvisation, workflow boundaries

features.description: Added Intent â†’ Command Mapping table to core rules. Loose instructions now map to defined command procedures.
features.details: When user says 'activate this' or 'work on this', agent reads and follows .cursor/commands/activate.md procedure instead of improvising.

features.description: Added 'NO IMPROVISATION' rule - agent must follow command procedures for workflow actions
features.details: Prevents agent from skipping steps when given loose instructions.

features.description: Added Workflow Boundaries - command chaining rules and mandatory STOP after completion
features.details: Agent executes chained commands fully but STOPs after final command. Does not auto-start next task.

features.description: Added Mandatory Prerequisites before work begins
features.details: Issue must have assignment, estimate, and priority before moving to In Progress.

features.description: Status Change Protocol now requires update_issue(stateId) call, not just comments
features.details: Fixes issue where agent added comments but didn't actually change Linear status.

upgrade_notes: This is a workflow governance update
Loose instructions now follow command procedures
Agent will STOP after completing requested commands
Prerequisites (assign, size, priority) enforced before In Progress
Status changes now paired: update_issue + create_comment
